thread.title: Charles M Farrell
thread.title_full: webuyanycar.com reviewed by Charles M Farrell

author: Charles M Farrell
title: Charles M Farrell
text: Started at Lansdale location - they were very helpful and accommodating, and in order to give us the most excellent customer service that we needed, they allowed us to finish up the transaction at the Willow Grove location later that day. Both reps were very helpful and went out of their way to make this smooth and easy. Would highly recommend either location!
